title: Login Troubleshooting Guide
text: If users cannot log in, verify email format, check SSO configuration, confirm token expiry, and ensure the user has correct role permissions. Inspect logs at /var/log/auth-service for errors.

title: API Rate Limits
text: Free tier users are limited to 100 requests per minute. Pro tier has 1,000 requests per minute. Exceeding limits returns HTTP 429 Too Many Requests.

title: Data Backup Policy
text: All customer data is backed up daily at 2 AM UTC. Backups are retained for 30 days. Redundant storage ensures 99.9% durability.

title: Role-Based Access Controls
text: SaaS accounts support Admin, Manager, Editor, Viewer roles. Only Admins can manage billing and user provisioning.

title: Webhooks Overview
text: Webhooks support event types such as user.created, invoice.generated, and subscription.renewed. Webhooks must reply with 2xx within 5 seconds.
